message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit high for you, but $100 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140.
Alice,  $140 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'll offer you $120.  This is my final offer.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to be fair, but $120 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $145, which is the lowest I can go.
